segments.text: Will I get notification that I qualify for unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Employment Development Office will send you a Notice of Unemployment Insurance Award letter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is contained in that letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In addition to telling you how much you will receive , the beginning and ending dates of your claim will be included .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the Award Letter tell me what I need to fill out next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will receive a Continued Claim Form and every two weeks , you must turn it in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I fill out the Continued Claim Form , what will I need to tell them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must show where and when you tried to look for work . If you earned any money , you need to tell them about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other information does the form ask for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to tell them if you were too sick to work on any of the days that you should have been looking for work .
segments.speaker: S2
